thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com | 5 of 78
thread.title: Kyle

author: Kyle
title: Kyle
text: I sold a gift card to Card Kangaroo and the initial process was very easy. I put in my gift card amount, CK told me how much they would pay for it, and then gave me a pre-paid shipping label to mail in the gift card. It ended up taking over a week to receive payment and no communication was received until I contacted CK after the first week. After 10 days, I was paid the full amount so I do not have any complaints other than the time delay.
